application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of materials, refuse storage and noise insulation pursuant to conditions 3, 4 and 5 or planning permission dated 06.11.2017 ref. 2017/2024 (Erection of a three storey building (between 72 Bedford Hill and the railway embankment) to provide a shop/store on ground floor and a two bedroom maisonette on first and second floors. (Amendments to planning permission dated 23/07/2014 ref 2013/3267 to include the erection of mansard roof extension to main rear roof and conversion to provide 1 x 1-bedroom.)
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - INFORMATIVE: You are reminded that the decorate cornicing and bands  above the windows require installation as per the approved drawings under planning permisison 2017/2024 dated 06.11.2017.

Reason : 1 - The limited details provided for the proposed details, and as built material pallette would harm the integrity of host property and would not preserve the character and appearance of the area. The materials would therefore not be in accordance with policies DMS1, DMS2 and DMH5 of the Development Management Policies Document (2016) and the guidance within the Housing SPD (2016).

Reason : 2 - Limited details were provided in support of the proposed refuse storage. Therefore the proposed details are contrary to DMS1 of the Development Management Policies Document (2016) and the guidance within the Housing SPD (2016).e opposite.

Reason : 3 - No details were submitted to demonstrate appropriate sound insulation measures have been installed to mitigate against noise generated from the railway line opposite. Therefore the proposed details are contrary to DMH4(ii) of the Development Management Policies Document (2016) and the guidance within the Housing SPD (2016).e opposite.
